strong.a: See pictures and videos from our teachers updated 4/22 – click here.

span.strong: Due to COVID-19, School will be closed the rest of the school year.

strong.span: STUDENT PACKETS WILL STILL BE AVAILABLE DURING GOVERNORS STAY AT HOME ORDER

span.strong: Click here for more info – Updated 3/30/20 – 4:00 PM

p.span: This is a reminder that Burke Basic School will be
closed on Friday April 10th, and Monday April 13th
. Packet pickup for next week will only be on Tuesday the 14th, from 8 am to 4 pm. We will be back to normal pickup schedule on April 20

b.span: STATE RESOURCES FOR THOSE IN NEED –

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

p.strong:
Please click here to find the resources we have setup online to help with learning opportunities for your student.
COX has an internet program if you are needing help accessing or continue accessing the internet click here.
Click below for a link to Mesa Public Schools that are offering meals to the students during the closure.

strong.span:
Welcome to Burke Basic School.
Give Your Child a Private School Quality Education for Free!

p.span: Our commitment is to give children an excellent educational foundation. Our mission is to provide a learning environment that will improve student achievement. We strive to have students experience daily growth and academic success. We know that offering the highest level of services to parents and students is vital to our mission.

div.div: Copyright 2017 Burke Basic School Average salary of all teachers employed in the budget year 2020: $46,436 Average salary of all teachers employed in the prior year 2019: $45,577 Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018: $1859.00 Percentage increase: 4.2%
